comments:
I have installed Eclipse 3.2 and created sample BIRT report in it. All was Ok. After this I have not worked with BIRT for few monthes, but regularly has updated Eclipse via update manager. When I recently have tried to work with BIRT, any attempt to open existing report or create new one results in "java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.ui.editors.ReportEditorProxy", full stack trace see at the end of this report.
Behavior is identical on 2 computers. Attempt to update BIRT manually (in strict accordance with Install guide) did not resolve a problem.
Stack trace:

It is really nice, when bug that was submitted first and with more complete information provided is marked as duplicate of bug that has been submited later and with much more vague description.
